edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model.validators

Interface Validator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JsonLdValidator

    public interface Validator
    A validator validates a String of its implemented format against the WADM Schema.
    An implementation is required if Annotation Validation is activated and annotations should support PUT/POST with the implemented format.

    Implementing subclasses must use at (at)Component annotation of Spring, otherwise they are not registered.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matthias Dressel, Michael Hitzker, Markus Hoefler, Andreas Loeffler, Timo Schmidt

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Format getFormat()
      Gets the implemented format
      boolean validateAnnotation(java.lang.String annotationString)
      Validates a given AnnotationString in the given format against the Web Annotation Data Model - Schema.
      boolean validateContainer(java.lang.String containerString)
      Validates a given ContainerString in the given format against the Web Annotation Data Model - Schema.

    • Method Detail

      • validateAnnotation

        boolean validateAnnotation(java.lang.String annotationString)
        Validates a given AnnotationString in the given format against the Web Annotation Data Model - Schema.
        Parameters:
        annotationString - The annotation as a String
        Returns:
        True if a valid annotation, false otherwise

      • validateContainer

        boolean validateContainer(java.lang.String containerString)
        Validates a given ContainerString in the given format against the Web Annotation Data Model - Schema. It has to be a valid AnnotationCollection.
        Parameters:
        containerString - The container as a String
        Returns:
        True if a valid AnnotationCollection, false otherwise

      • getFormat

        Format getFormat()
        Gets the implemented format
        Returns:
        The implemented format
